original_text: The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses; from their children have ye taken away my glory for ever.
korean_text: 내 백성의 부녀들을 그들의 즐거운 집에서 쫓아내고 그들의 어린 자녀에게서 나의 영광을 영원히 빼앗는도다

sentences.original_text: have ye cast out from their pleasant houses
have ye taken away my glory for ever
